com.vangav.backend.play_framework.request

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.play_framework.request.Request

  • public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    Request contains the request, its response, dispatcher buffer, exception, and everything about a request-response pair. A new object of Request is created for each request and moved around for the life-time of that request till response and after-response operations are finished.

        public VangavException getTheLastVangavException()
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        getTheLastVangavException
        Returns:
        the last thrown VangavException (i.e.: the fatal exception that caused this request to fail) and null if vangav exceptions' list is empty
